//
// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.29.952.3111
//
// Parameters:
//
//   float4 gAfColorOffset;
//   float4 gAfColorScale;
//   row_major float4x4 gConfigMatrix;
//   row_major float4x4 gEffectWorldViewProj;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name                 Reg   Size
//   -------------------- ----- ----
//   gEffectWorldViewProj c200     4
//   gConfigMatrix        c240     3
//   gAfColorScale        c244     1
//   gAfColorOffset       c245     1
//

    vs_3_0
    def c0, 0.5, -0.5, 1, 0
    dcl_position v0
    dcl_normal v1
    dcl_position o0
    dcl_texcoord2 o1
    dcl_texcoord3 o2
    dcl_texcoord o3.xy
    dcl_texcoord1 o4

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s0

    mul r0, c201, v0.y
    mad r0, v0.x, c200, r0
    mad r0, v0.z, c202, r0
    add r0, r0, c203

mov o0, r0 // Relocated from line 44 with shadertool.py

// Automatic vertex shader halo fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i -f --only-autofixed --auto-fix-vertex-halo FEE72F75.txt
texldl r2, c220.z, s0
add r2.w, r0.w, -r2.y
mad r0.x, r2.w, r2.x, r0.x

    mul r1.xyz, r0.xyww, c0.xyxw
    add o4.xy, r1.z, r1
    mul r1.xyz, c241, v1.y
    mad r1.xyz, v1.x, c240, r1
    mad r1.xyz, v1.z, c242, r1
    add r1.w, -r1_abs.z, c0.z
    mad o1, r1.w, c244, r1_abs.z
    mov o3.xy, r1
    mul o2, r1.w, c245

//     mov o0, r0 // Relocated to line 35 with shadertool.py
    mov o4.zw, r0

// approximately 15 instruction slots used
